text: @RandPaul @NYGovCuomo Do you remember when you got COVID-19 you stayed in the capital? Used the gym and pool? @NYGovCuomo did what he could to save his citizens.. You are beyond incompetent. We lose @repjohnlewis and your still here,? Really?
